title: Wall Street Breakfast March 15th: Next Steps In Brexit Saga?

description: Today's top stories: the pound gets a bounce from the latest Brexit twist, the market looks to finish a strong week, and the SEC files suit against Volkswagen. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
